value.title: DAX Fridays #155: How to set default value of a slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to set the default value of a slicer in Power Bi using some simple DAX. value.title: DAX Fridays! #9: RANKX DAX Function

value.title: Automatically Send Power BI Report as PDF or PPT format in Email

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Sort By A Measure Not Shown In Visual
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Patrick shows you how you can sort by a measure not show in a visual within Power BI Desktop. This was something we didn't even know about until recently and it a great little Power BI nugget. If you wanted to sort by something not shown in a visual, this video is for you!

value.title: Replace BLANK with Zero in Power BI Visuals Such as Card
value.excerpt: If you use a field in a visual and based on a combination of slicer selection, that field doesn't have any value, you might see blank in the visual. If you want to replace that blank to zero, here is a trick for you. a very simple trick that you can use anywhere easily. Read more details in my blog post,
